name: Tab Pane
description: Sortable tab strip with integrated content card.

use: you need sortable tabs with a content panel.
avoid: a basic tab list is sufficient.

examples.minimal:
TabPane<String>(
  items: const [TabPaneData('A'), TabPaneData('B')],
  focused: 0,
  onFocused: (index) {},
  itemBuilder: (context, item, index) => TabChild(child: Text(item.data)),
  child: const Text('Content'),
)

theming: `TabPaneTheme` controls background, border, and bar height.
accessibility: Ensure drag handles have keyboard alternatives.
